BootstrapTextblock.Title: OpenCms Introduction: Step 1 - Modify a page

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
So you are logged in and wonder where the controls are? Look to the upper rigt corner of the screen. See the OpenCms "bullseye" icon? Click this to activate the toolbar!

Now let's add some content to this page

  • Step 1: Click on the Add contentÂ button in the toolbar. You get a list of the available content types that you can add to the page.
  • Step 2: Click on the first entry "Text Block". You get a list of text blocks that have already been created.
  • Step 3: Move the mouse cursor to the entry called "Demo text element". You may need to scroll down a bit. On the right hand side of the element box you will see some icons appear.
  • Step 4: Move the cursor over the Move to page icon, click and drag the element into the page. Possible target areas will be highlighted. Place the content anywhere you like.
